refnamediv.refpurpose: Builds a single, axis-aligned, rectangular parallelepiped (RPP) that will contain the objects and paths specified.

refsection.title: DESCRIPTION
refsection.para: The make_bb (make bounding box) command builds a single, axis-aligned, rectangular parallelepiped (RPP) that will contain the objects and paths specified. The paths will include any transformation matrices that accumulate from combinations along the path. The listeval command may be used to see the effect of transformation matrices along a path.

refsection.title: EXAMPLES
refsection.para: The example shows the use of the make_bb command to create a parallelepiped with a specified name that contains a particular object and path.

example.title: Create a parallelepiped with a specified name that contains a particular object and path.

listitem.para: Creates an RPP named new_bb that is large enough to contain shapea and group1/region3.
